title: V5 recruiting rank team to start online ladder
body:
Add V5 desyre or V5 beast in game and message for details. Specifically looking for a jungler and bot lane, and a couple of subs too. 
Prefer platinum + but lenient on your rank depending on skill level 

Will have to have Skype, as we'll complete team ranked provisionals firstly before moving onto the online ladder.

Cheers

replies.body: g4 - ad main, added you if you wanna trial me out.

p2 atm and climbing
only jg play yi mainly, but can elise, grag, jarvan, xin also
add me if you want, im online most of the time
